itemDisplayName: Managed Disks - Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) SOFS cluster
description: This template creates Azure VMs on an existing VNET, and it provisions them as a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) Scale-Out File Server (SOFS) cluster using Managed Disks.
summary: This template creates Azure VMs and Managed Disks for a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) cluster on an existing Azure VNET and Active Directory domain.
